description: Rate limit value configuration for port traffic
title: PortTrafficRateLimit

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

rate_limit_in_kbps.description: Rate limit in kilobits per second. Either rate_limit_in_kbps or rate_limit_in_percent must be given. Input both as null to reset the rate_limit value

rate_limit_in_percent.description: Rate limit in percent. Either rate_limit_in_kbps or rate_limit_in_percent must be given. Input both as null to reset the rate_limit value
